message: The FDA is aware of emerging supply concerns in the market and is actively monitoring the situation. We encourage manufacturers and stakeholders to report any significant changes in supply levels. Coordination efforts are ongoing to ensure continued market stability.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The current status is an emerging shortage with adequate supply and stable market conditions. message: The FDA is aware of an emerging drug shortage. We encourage manufacturers to increase production and report supply levels. Buyers are advised to maintain normal purchasing patterns to avoid exacerbating the situation. Coordination among stakeholders is encouraged to ensure patient needs are met.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging with insufficient supply and disrupted market stability.
